SEARCH
Module CODEX
Package CODEX.distributed.RMI

Interface ServerRMIInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServer
public interface ServerRMIInterface extends Remote
This interface represents the RMI server, which is unique.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      void startServer() throws RemoteException
      This method starts the server, so it can listen to the clients and receive their requests.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • createLobby

      GameControllerInterface createLobby(String creatorNickname, int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException, IllegalArgumentException
      This method calls the function into the ServerController
      Parameters:
      creatorNickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to create a new lobby
      numOfPlayers - is the number of player the creator decided can play in the lobby
      Returns:
      serverController.addPlayerToLobby(player, gameId) is the game controller of the match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
      IllegalArgumentException - when the number of players is wrong

    • addPlayerToLobby

      GameControllerInterface addPlayerToLobby(String playerNickname, int gameId) throws RemoteException, GameAlreadyStartedException, FullLobbyException, GameNotExistsException
      This method calls the function into the ServerController
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - is the nickname of the player who wants to join the lobby
      gameId - is the lobby the player wants to join
      Returns:
      serverController.addPlayerToLobby(player, gameId) is the game controller of the match
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
      GameAlreadyStartedException - thrown if a game is already started
      FullLobbyException - thrown if the lobby is full
      GameNotExistsException - thrown if there's no game

    • chooseNickname

      void chooseNickname(String nickname) throws RemoteException, NicknameAlreadyTakenException
      This method calls the function into the ServerController
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the String he wants to put as his nickname
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
      NicknameAlreadyTakenException - if a nickname is already used by others players

    • getAllGameControllers

      Map<Integer,GameController> getAllGameControllers() throws RemoteException
      Getter method
      Returns:
      serverController.getAllGameControllers() which are the available game controllers
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when there's a disconnection problem

    • getAvailableGameControllersId

      Set<Integer> getAvailableGameControllersId() throws RemoteException
      Getter method
      Returns:
      serverController.getAvailableGameControllersId() which are the id of available game controllers
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when there's a disconnection problem
